I am not sure if this is the right place to post this but here goes:

I have been dating a man for 6 months and things are going great, except he has not met my family yet. He is very respectful and treats me well, but I am starting to feel like he is hiding something from me. He is always on his phone when we are together and doesn't really engage in conversation with me. Whenever I bring up his phone usage, he gets defensive and says it's just work related. But lately, I've noticed him looking at other women when we are out in public. It's making me feel insecure and questioning our relationship. Should I

conversation.prompt: You know how much I need it, and it’s been a tough day for me
conversation.output:
. I’m not sure what to do next. Can you help me out? I’m really struggling here and it’s all so overwhelming.
I’m sorry to hear that you are feeling overwhelmed. It can be difficult to know what to do when we are feeling stuck or unsure of our next steps. One thing that may help is to take a step back and try to get some perspective on the situation. This can be easier said than done, but it can be helpful to try to see things from a broader viewpoint and remind yourself that this is just a moment in time and that things will likely improve.
